mapper.sql: created_time, id, parent_id, article_id, user_id, reply_user_id, content
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.parent_id AS parentId, c.article_id AS articleId, c.user_id AS userId, CASE WHEN u.nick_name IS NULL || u.nick_name = '' THEN u.username ELSE u.nick_name END AS username, u.avatar, c.reply_user_id AS replyUserId, ( SELECT CASE WHEN nick_name IS NULL || nick_name = '' THEN username ELSE nick_name END FROM sys_user WHERE id = replyUserId ) AS replyUsername, ( SELECT avatar FROM sys_user WHERE id = replyUserId ) AS replyAvatar, c.content, a.title, c.created_time AS createdTime FROM b_comment c LEFT JOIN b_article a ON a.id = c.article_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = c.user_id
and c.content like CONCAT(#{query.content},'%')
and u.username like CONCAT(#{query.username},'%') or u.nick_name like CONCAT(#{query.username},'%')
and c.user_id = #{userId}
and c.reply_user_id = #{userId}
and c.article_id = 0
and c.article_id != 0
ORDER BY c.created_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.parent_id as parentId, c.article_id as articleId, c.user_id as userId, c.content, CASE WHEN u.nick_name IS NULL || u.nick_name = '' THEN u.username ELSE u.nick_name END AS username, u.avatar, a.title, c.created_time as createdTime FROM b_comment c LEFT JOIN b_article a ON a.id = c.article_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = c.user_id where c.article_id=#{articleId} ORDER BY c.created_time ASC
